column4: 1) How do I enable both the Wired connection and wireless connection at the same time? 2) Can someone help me setup Beryl?
1) How do I enable both the Wired connection and wireless connection at the same time? 2) Can someone help me setup Beryl?
i should reiterate: .tar.gz AND checkinstall. tar -xzvf /path/to/tarball-0.0.0.tar.gz; cd /path/to/tarball-0.0.0; ./configure && make && sudo checkinstall
